edge: The composer Himesh Reshammiya created the soundtrack album Vaada in 2004.
The soundtrack album Vaada was released on November 20, 2004 (digital release) and January 7, 2005 (film).
The soundtrack album Vaada falls under the genre of feature film soundtracks.
Himesh Reshammiya served as both the composer and producer of the Vaada soundtrack album.
The song 'Main Ishq Uska' from the movie Ishq Hai Tumse has been included in the soundtrack album Vaada.
The song 'Teri Kurti Sexy' from the movie Vaada is a part of its namesake soundtrack album.
Sunidhi Chauhan and Kailash Kher lent their vocals to the track 'Ud Ud Ud Ud Jaye' from Vaada's soundtrack album.
Kavita Seth contributed to the song 'Maula' featured on the Vaada soundtrack album.
Udit Narayan and Alka Yagnik were among the singers who worked on the song 'Main Deewana' for Vaada's soundtrack album.
